title: Thermal investigation of NbSe2 nanoparticles synthesized through a temperature-dependent sonochemical method
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33459-33470

Shivani R. Bharucha, Mehul S. Dave, Sunil H. Chaki, Tushar A. Limbani
Due to their unique size-dependent properties, transition metal di-chalcogenide nanoparticles are trending in research for their potential to revolutionize next-generation electronics, energy storage, and catalytic processes.
